Message.Title: Yahoo lies about US economy just before election to try boost Obama
Message.Msg: There is no evidence of Global or US economy stabilization. Over 12 million were added to welfare rolls. Last months new job creation numbers were found to be half than what department of labor reported. DOL continuing to remove people from unemployment statistics who have run out of benefits although they still have not found a job. Emplyers continue slashing jobs in preparation for Obama's new high taxes scheduled for 2013. (that is the only way employers can pay the new taxes is by cutting the workforce) Yahoo "news" needs to start telling the truth and not act like a leftist mainstream media propaganda machine which loses credibility in eyes of the American public.

Topic.Title: Three advices to Yahoo...

Message.Msg: The top reason I am using Google search instead of Bing search is this: Bing is missing the "News" function of Google. For example, if you search "Yahoo" on Google, there is a link called "News for Yahoo" in the result, by clicking on the link, you could review all the media news for Yahoo from the latest to elder news. I don't believe that Bing is not able to archive that but just Bing has not realized it.
